  2. Click on '...'
  3. Scroll down to '...'
  4. See error

  A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

  If applicable, add screenshots to help explain the problem.

  If possible, provide relevant logs or console output.

- OS: [e.g., Windows, macOS, Linux]
